replies.body: Chermorg provides some good insight here.  We'll be posting updates in [this thread](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update), but it sucks to say that transfers are down right now due to technical issues.  :(  Hang tight!

When preparing to re-enable server transfers after the end-of-season rewards, they noticed problems in how the data centers are communicating. They estimated at that time it’d take a few weeks to fix, and they’ll update us when they’re back online (or when they have a better date)
